Sept. 15, 1979 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Three)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Three) 430 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-third-section
Test Piece Contest
From the New World [arr. Rimmer]
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 8 bands competed. 21st annual contest.
May 28, 2014, 6:51 a.m. March 29, 2017, 7:48 p.m.
1 Riddings Band W. J. Saint
2 Creswell Colliery Band Mervyn Griffiths
3 Shirebrook Band Seth Appleton
Unknown Result Maltby Miners Welfare Band Julie Holling
Unknown Result Langwith Miners Welfare Robert Moss
Unknown Result Ecclesfield Silver Alan Exley
Unknown Result Newark Town Jack Mather
Unknown Result Barnsley Music Centre Harold Lillford
